types1:Item.types1:Name: Cloud-Platform-REST-API
types1:Item.types1:Description:
Used to interact with IICS Cloud Platform APIs. This connector can be used to interact with Platform Verion2, Platform Verion3, Data Integration & Mass Ingestion REST APIs.
REST APIs Documentation Link https://docs.informatica.com/integration-cloud/cloud-platform/current-version/rest-api-reference/preface.html

businessConnector.name: Cloud-Platform-REST-API
businessConnector.description:
Used to interact with IICS Cloud Platform APIs. This connector can be used to interact with Platform Verion2, Platform Verion3, Data Integration & Mass Ingestion REST APIs.
REST APIs Documentation Link https://docs.informatica.com/integration-cloud/cloud-platform/current-version/rest-api-reference/preface.html

connectionAttribute.description: Region Name[North America = us, Europe = em, Asia Pacific=ap]. Example: For North America, Region = us
connectionAttribute.name: Region

connectionAttribute.description: Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services user name. Maximum length is 255 characters.
connectionAttribute.name: username

connectionAttribute.description: Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services password. Maximum length is 255 characters.
connectionAttribute.name: password

action.label: Login
action.name: Login
action.description: You can use this resource to log in to your organization using your Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services user account

action.label: ActivityLog
action.name: ActivityLog
action.description: Use this resource to request log information for completed jobs from the Monitor service. You can also request error logs and session logs.

parameter.description: Job ID associated with the log entry ID.
parameter.name: runId

parameter.description: Task ID associated with the log entry ID. If taskId is not specified, all activityLog entries for all tasks are returned.
parameter.name: taskId

parameter.description: The number of rows to skip. For example, you might want to skip the first three rows.
parameter.name: offset

parameter.description: The maximum number of rows to return. The maximum number you can specify is 1000. If you omit this attribute, the activityLog returns all available rows, up to a maximum of 200 rows.
parameter.name: rowLimit

field.name: activityLogResponse

action.label: GetBase
action.name: GetBase
action.description: Abstract action reused by all the Version 2 GET APIs

parameter.description: Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services session ID for version 2 REST API session
parameter.name: icSessionId

parameter.description: Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services URL for the organization the user belongs to
parameter.name: serverUrl

action.label: ActivityMonitor
action.name: ActivityMonitor
action.description: Use this resource to request log information for running jobs from the Monitor service.

field.name: activityMonitorResponse

action.label: PostBase
action.name: PostBase
action.description: Abstract action reused by all the POST Version 2 APIs

parameter.description: Session ID for version 2 REST API session
parameter.name: icSessionId

parameter.description: Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services URL for the organization the user belongs to
parameter.name: serverUrl

action.label: CreateConnection
action.name: CreateConnection
action.description: Use this action to create Cloud Data Integration Connection

parameter.description: Connection attributes with name value pair.
parameter.name: nameValueList

action.label: CreateMappingTask
action.name: CreateMappingTask
action.description: Used to create a mapping task.

parameter.description: ID of the project or folder to contain the task. If not included in the request, the task is created in the Default folder.
parameter.name: containerId

parameter.description: Task name
parameter.name: name

parameter.description: Description for the task
parameter.name: description

parameter.description: ID of the runtime environment used for the task.
parameter.name: runtimeEnvironmentId

parameter.description: ID of the mapping used in the task.
parameter.name: mappingId

parameter.description: Name of the Salesforce Source Object
parameter.name: srcObject

parameter.description: Include in the mtTaskParameter object. Source connection ID
parameter.name: sourceConnectionId

parameter.description: Include in the mtTaskParameter object. Target connection ID
parameter.name: targetConnectionId

parameter.description: Schedule associated with the task, if any.
parameter.name: scheduleId

action.label: Lookup
action.name: Lookup
action.description: Use the lookup resource to look up an object's ID, name, path, or type attributes. Refer to this link for detailed API documentation https://docs.informatica.com/integration-cloud/cloud-platform/current-version/rest-api-reference/platform-rest-api-version-3-resources/lookup.html

parameter.description: Full path of the object including project, folder, and object name. Required with type if object ID not included.
parameter.name: path

parameter.description: Type of object. Required with path if object ID not included.
parameter.name: type

parameter.description: Global identifier of the object. Required if object path and type not included.
parameter.name: id

action.label: GetBaseV3
action.name: GetBaseV3
action.description: Abstract GET Action for Version 3 REST APIs

parameter.description: Session ID for V3 REST APIs
parameter.name: icSessionId

parameter.description: Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services URL for the organization the user belongs to
parameter.name: serverUrl

action.label: PostBaseV3
action.name: PostBaseV3
action.description: Abstract POST action for Version 3 REST APIs

parameter.description: Session ID for V3 REST APIs
parameter.name: icSessionId

parameter.description: Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services URL for the organization the user belongs to
parameter.name: serverUrl

action.label: GetMappingByName
action.name: GetMappingByName
action.description: Get Mapping details using mapping name

parameter.description: Name of the mapping
parameter.name: name

action.label: GetSchedule
action.name: GetSchedule
action.description: Use this resource to get details of the schedules in the organization

field.name: scheduleResponse

processObject.name: nameValue
processObject.description: Used to maintain name value pair
